description: This file declares external function prototypes for an Audio Codec component in the ANSC (Advanced Networking Service Container) framework. It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the Audio Codec, serving as an interface for external modules interacting with the codec.

methods.name: AnscCreateAudioCodec
methods.description: Factory function to create an Audio Codec handle with specified context parameters.

methods.name: AnscAcoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Audio Codec object with container and owner contexts.

methods.name: AnscAcoRemove
methods.description: Removes the Audio Codec object and cleans up resources.

methods.name: AnscAcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects or dependencies for the Audio Codec instance.

methods.name: AnscAcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Audio Codec object, setting up internal states.
